titles.title: A bill to require any person that maintains an internet website or that sells or distributes a mobile application that is owned, wholly or partially, by a foreign adversary country, by a foreign adversary country-owned-entity, or by a non-state-owned entity located in a foreign adversary country, or that stores and maintains information collected from such website or application in a foreign adversary country, to disclose that fact to any individual who downloads or otherwise uses such website or application.
Internet Application I.D. Act
Internet Application I.D. Act
Internet Application Integrity and Disclosure Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
